[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv, dqc_0129.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - D:\Temp\tmpe61q7eb6\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0161.10083] The filing has reported a value for the element atnf:ConvertiblePromissoryNoteDescription with a value of KBL entered into a $1,666,667 10% Secured Convertible Promissory Note and $138,889 10% Senior Secured Convertible Extension Promissory Note (together the “Dominion Convertible Promissory Notes”) with Dominion Capital LLC (“Dominion”), which was issued to Dominion in conjunction with 20,000 shares of common stock (the “Dominion Commitment Shares”) and assumed a discount of $722,996, which has been amortized to interest expense over the term of the debt. using the axis InvestmentTypeAxis in the role 059 - Disclosure - Convertible Notes Payable (Details) on the table atnf:ConvertibleNotesPayableDetailsTable. However, the only member used to disaggregate the total for atnf:ConvertiblePromissoryNoteDescription was the member atnf:KBLConvertibleMember. If only one member is used on this axis then the filer should either:
1. Retag the filing using the element InvestmentTypeExtensibleEnumeration with a value of atnf:KBLConvertibleMember. The member atnf:KBLConvertibleMember should be removed from the value as it represents the aggregate value of atnf:ConvertiblePromissoryNoteDescription.
2. Tag the aggregate value of atnf:ConvertiblePromissoryNoteDescription with a value of KBL entered into a $1,666,667 10% Secured Convertible Promissory Note and $138,889 10% Senior Secured Convertible Extension Promissory Note (together the “Dominion Convertible Promissory Notes”) with Dominion Capital LLC (“Dominion”), which was issued to Dominion in conjunction with 20,000 shares of common stock (the “Dominion Commitment Shares”) and assumed a discount of $722,996, which has been amortized to interest expense over the term of the debt. without the InvestmentTypeAxis axis. This rule will not generate an error if the aggregate value of atnf:ConvertiblePromissoryNoteDescription is reported.
The properties of this atnf:ConvertiblePromissoryNoteDescription fact are: Period :2020-06-01 to 2020-06-12 Dimensions : us-gaap:InvestmentTypeAxis=atnf:KBLConvertibleMember Unit : None
Rule Element Id:10083 Rule version: 22.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1690080/000121390023049728/ea179836-s1_180lifesci.htm 21846

property.name: value
property.value: KBL entered into a $1,666,667 10% Secured Convertible Promissory Note and $138,889 10% Senior Secured Convertible Extension Promissory Note (together the “Dominion Convertible Promissory Notes”) with Dominion Capital LLC (“Dominion”), which was issued to Dominion in conjunction with 20,000 shares of common stock (the “Dominion Commitment Shares”) and assumed a discount of $722,996, which has been amortized to interest expense over the term of the debt.
